languages.text: "Враг разбит, Ваша Светлость. Мы получаем вокс-сигнал с просьбой принять на борт конвой шаттлов для аудиенции. Авгуры подтверждают, что шаттлы не несут вооружения и принадлежат к силам, оказавшим нам помощь в сражении. Разрешите принять гостей?"

traits.locale_text: "Враг разбит, Ваша Светлость. Мы получаем вокс-сигнал с просьбой принять на борт конвой шаттлов для аудиенции. Авгуры подтверждают, что шаттлы не несут вооружения и не принадлежат к силам Лорд-инквизитора. Разрешите принять гостей?"

languages.text: "The enemy has been routed, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. We are receiving a vox-signal requesting that we admit a convoy of shuttles on board for an audience. The augurs have confirmed that the shuttles are unarmed and belong to the forces that aided us in battle. Do you wish us to welcome these visitors?"
languages.original_text: "Враг разбит, Ваша Светлость. Мы получаем вокс-сигнал с просьбой принять на борт конвой шаттлов для аудиенции. Авгуры подтверждают, что шаттлы не несут вооружения и принадлежат к силам, оказавшим нам помощь в сражении. Разрешите принять гостей?"

traits.locale_text: "The enemy has been routed, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. We are receiving a vox-signal requesting that we admit a convoy of shuttles on board for an audience. The augurs have confirmed that the shuttles are unarmed and not part of the Lord Inquisitor's forces. Do you wish us to welcome the guests?"

"The enemy has been routed, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. We are receiving a vox-signal requesting that we admit a convoy of shuttles on board for an audience. The augurs have confirmed that the shuttles are unarmed and not part of the Lord Inquisitor's forces. Do you wish us to welcome the guests?"

"The enemy has been routed, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. We are receiving a vox-signal requesting that we admit a convoy of shuttles on board for an audience. The augurs have confirmed that the shuttles are unarmed and belong to the forces that aided us in battle. Do you wish us to welcome the guests?"

"The enemy has been routed, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. We are receiving a vox-signal requesting that we admit a convoy of shuttles on board for an audience. The augurs have confirmed that the shuttles are unarmed and belong to the forces that aided us in battle. Do you wish us to welcome the guests?"

"The enemy has been routed, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. We are receiving a vox-signal requesting that we admit a convoy of shuttles on board for an audience. The augurs have confirmed that the shuttles are unarmed and belong to the forces that aided us in battle. Do you wish us to welcome these visitors?"

"The enemy has been routed, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. We are receiving a vox-signal requesting that we admit a convoy of shuttles on board for an audience. The augurs have confirmed that the shuttles are unarmed and belong to the forces that aided us in battle. Do you wish us to welcome these visitors?"

languages.text: “大人，我们已经击退了敌人。我们收到了音阵信号，要求允许几艘穿梭机进入我们的舰船。俄歇扫描结果显示，那些穿梭机没有任何武装，属于在刚刚那场战斗中协助我们的势力。您打算接待这些客人吗？”
languages.original_text: "The enemy has been routed, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. We are receiving a vox-signal requesting that we admit a convoy of shuttles on board for an audience. The augurs have confirmed that the shuttles are unarmed and belong to the forces that aided us in battle. Do you wish us to welcome these visitors?"

traits.locale_text: “大人，我们已经击退了敌人。我们收到了音阵信号，要求允许几艘穿梭机进入我们的舰船。俄歇扫描结果显示，那些穿梭机没有任何武装，属于在刚刚那场战斗中协助我们的势力。您打算接待这些客人吗？”

languages.text: "Der Feind wurde in die Flucht geschlagen, Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Wir empfangen ein Vox-Signal, in dem darum gebeten wird, einen Konvoi von Shuttles für eine Audienz an Bord zu lassen. Die Auguren haben bestätigt, dass die Shuttles unbewaffnet sind und Truppen gehören, die uns im Kampf unterstützt haben. Sollen wir diese Besucher willkommen heißen?"
languages.original_text: "The enemy has been routed, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. We are receiving a vox-signal requesting that we admit a convoy of shuttles on board for an audience. The augurs have confirmed that the shuttles are unarmed and belong to the forces that aided us in battle. Do you wish us to welcome these visitors?"

traits.locale_text: "Der Feind wurde in die Flucht geschlagen, Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Wir empfangen ein Vox-Signal, in dem darum gebeten wird, einen Konvoi von Shuttles für eine Audienz an Bord zu lassen. Die Auguren haben bestätigt, dass die Shuttles unbewaffnet sind und Truppen gehören, die uns im Kampf unterstützt haben. Sollen wir die Gäste willkommen heißen?"

languages.text: «El enemigo huye en desbandada, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Hemos recibido una vocoseñal solicitando que recibamos una caravana de lanzaderas a bordo para tener una audiencia con usted. Los augures confirman que las lanzaderas no van armadas y pertenecen a las fuerzas que nos han prestado ayuda en la batalla. ¿Desea recibirlos?».
languages.original_text: "The enemy has been routed, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. We are receiving a vox-signal requesting that we admit a convoy of shuttles on board for an audience. The augurs have confirmed that the shuttles are unarmed and belong to the forces that aided us in battle. Do you wish us to welcome these visitors?"

traits.locale_text: «El enemigo huye en desbandada, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Hemos recibido una vocoseñal solicitando que recibamos una caravana de lanzaderas a bordo para tener una audiencia con usted. Los augures confirman que las lanzaderas no van armadas y pertenecen a las fuerzas que nos han prestado ayuda en la batalla. ¿Desea recibir a los invitados?».

languages.text: « L'ennemi est en déroute, Votre Seigneurie. Nous recevons un signal-vox : un convoi de navettes demande audience à bord du vaisseau. Les augures confirment que ces navettes ne sont pas armées et qu'elles appartiennent aux troupes qui nous ont prêté main-forte. Souhaitez-vous les accueillir ? »
languages.original_text: "The enemy has been routed, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. We are receiving a vox-signal requesting that we admit a convoy of shuttles on board for an audience. The augurs have confirmed that the shuttles are unarmed and belong to the forces that aided us in battle. Do you wish us to welcome these visitors?"

traits.locale_text: « L'ennemi est en déroute, Votre Seigneurie. Nous recevons un signal-vox : un convoi de navettes demande audience à bord du vaisseau. Les augures confirment que ces navettes ne sont pas armées et qu'elles appartiennent aux troupes qui nous ont prêté main-forte. Souhaitez-vous les accueillir ? »

languages.text: 「敵は撃退されました、陛下。シャトルの護衛団を乗船させ謁見させろとの信号を受信しています。スキャナーは、シャトルが非武装であり、戦闘で我々を支援した部隊のものであることを確認しました。来訪者を迎え入れますか？」
languages.original_text: "The enemy has been routed, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. We are receiving a vox-signal requesting that we admit a convoy of shuttles on board for an audience. The augurs have confirmed that the shuttles are unarmed and belong to the forces that aided us in battle. Do you wish us to welcome these visitors?"

traits.locale_text: 「敵は撃退されました、陛下。シャトルの護衛団を乗船させ謁見させろとの信号を受信しています。スキャナーは、シャトルが非武装であり、戦闘で我々を支援した部隊のものであることを確認しました。来訪者を迎え入れますか？」

languages.text: "Düşman alt edildi {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Bir mekik konvoyunu görüşme için gemiye almamızı talep eden bir voks sinyali alıyoruz. Alametler, bu mekiklerin silahsız olduğunu ve savaşta bize yardım eden kuvvetleri barındırdığını olduğunu doğruladı. Bu misafirleri kabul etmemizi ister misiniz?"
languages.original_text: "The enemy has been routed, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. We are receiving a vox-signal requesting that we admit a convoy of shuttles on board for an audience. The augurs have confirmed that the shuttles are unarmed and belong to the forces that aided us in battle. Do you wish us to welcome these visitors?"

traits.locale_text: "Düşman alt edildi {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Bir mekik konvoyunu görüşme için gemiye almamızı talep eden bir voks sinyali alıyoruz. Alametler, bu mekiklerin silahsız olduğunu ve savaşta bize yardım eden kuvvetlere ait olduğunu doğruladı. Bu misafirleri kabul etmemizi ister misiniz?"
